name: Demise Sanctuary
detailed_description:
JOIN THE COMMUNITY


WISHLIST AND FOLLOW



If you want to support and contribute to the development of Demise Sanctuary, don't hesitate to Wishlist AND Follow the game on Steam, thanks!


About the Game



FIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE. GET POWERFUL. REGAIN YOUR FREEDOM.
IF YOU DARE.

Demise Sanctuary is a fast-paced twin-stick action roguelike game set in a dark Sci-Fi universe, with a gameplay inspired by Risk of Rain, Hyper Light Drifter and The Binding of Isaac.

ESCAPE THE SANCTUARY

You play as a Mage-Warrior with psychic abilities. You wake up in a grim place without windows. Your last clear memory is the capture of your ship by what you identified as the fleet of The Collector. This mad and powerful being now detains you in his Sanctuary, a mythical megastructure with ever changing room layouts where he keeps his impressive collections of other-worldly creatures and Artefacts. The Collector will now enjoy watching you explore, fight, harness the powers of Artefacts and eventually die in your attempt to escape the Sanctuary. But in this cursed place, death is only temporary, as The Collector will endlessly bring you to life, stripping you of all your Artefacts in the process.

Unless you have what it takes to be the first to ever escape this Demise Sanctuary.



MAIN FEATURES

  • A central Hub from which you can explore procedurally generated dungeons full of monsters, bosses, traps and powerful Artefacts
  • Visceral combats with perma-death based on melee and range attacks and psychic abilities allowing you to slow and even rewind time
  • Deep risk/reward mechanics that you will have to master to prevail
  • Dozens of stackable Artefacts of different rarities to combine and create powerful synergies
  • Unique and Boss Artefacts granting powerful build-defining abilities
  • Threat level system that increases the number of monsters in the Sanctuary after each dungeon exploration
  • Diverse cheptel of monsters forcing you to stay on your toes and make the most of your Artefact-enabled powers
  • An engaging universe drawn with beautiful modern pixel art with dynamic shadows and detailed special effects
  • A thrilling original soundtrack blending electronic and acoustic instruments for captivating atmospheres

short_description: Fight hordes of otherworldly monsters and explore procedurally generated dungeons in this addicting twin-stick action roguelike with beautiful pixelart. Mastering risk/reward mechanics and creating powerful Artefact synergies will be key to survive and escape the Demise Sanctuary!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
